document_data.caption: A map of Tabot showing Nam Tso in the bottom left; the Nam River is the eastern tributary.
document_data.name: Nam River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nam River''' was a river in the [[Haraki Ridge]] in [[Tabot]].
document_data.Geography: The Nam River emerged from the foot of the [[Marnu Cliffs]] before it rushed westward to fill [[Nam Tso]]. The lake was also fed by the [[Wohani River]], which emerged from the range further to the north.
